body.name: Listerine Gum Therapy Antiplaque & Anti-Gingivitis Mouthwash, Oral Rinse to Help Reverse Signs of Early Gingivitis Like Bleeding Gums, ADA Accepted, Glacier Mint, 1 L
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 50 mins
features: 1-liter bottle of Listerine Gum Therapy Antiplaque & Antigingivitis Gum Care Mouthwash cleans below the gum line for a clean mouth and fresh breath with a refreshing glacier mint flavor

This ADA Accepted mouthwash is specially designed to promote gum health by helping reverse the signs of early gum disease such as bleeding, redness, and inflammation for 4-times healthier gums in 3 weeks versus brushing alone when used twice a day

From the #1 dentist recommended brand of over the counter mouthwashes, it also helps remove plaque, one of the leading causes of gum disease. Swish twice a day for 24-hour germ* protection.*Germs that cause plaque, gingivitis, and bad breath

Listerine is 5X more effective than flossing for plaque reduction* (*Sustained plaque reduction above the gum line after a dental cleaning) and is made with the essential oils eucalyptol, menthol, methyl salicylate and thymol as active ingredients
To protect your gums from gingivitis causing germs and promote a whole mouth clean, rinse full strength with 20mL of the anti-gingivitis mouthwash morning and night. Do not swallow
body.description: Protect your gums from gingivitis causing germs and enjoy a whole mouth clean with Listerine Antiplaque and Antigingivitis Gum Therapy Mouthwash. This ADA-accepted mouthwash from a dentist-recommended over-the-counter mouthwash brand is specially designed to promote gum health by helping to reverse the signs of early gum disease such as bleeding, redness, and inflammation. When used twice a day, the gum care mouthwash can help deliver four-times healthier gums in three weeks versus brushing alone. Made with the essential oils eucalyptol, menthol, methyl salicylate, and thymol, this mouthwash also helps reduce plaque, one of the leading causes of gum disease. In fact, Listerine is five times more effective than flossing for plaque reduction.* To use the gum health mouthwash, rinse full strength with 20 milliliters of the anti-gingivitis mouthwash morning and night. Do not swallow. *Sustained plaque reduction above the gum line after a dental cleaning.

Rinse is not intended to replace brushing or flossing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I prefer the ones with alcohol in it and that have that burn, but because this was for gums I tried it out. I didn't care much for the flouride taste, it isn't enough for me to mark it down or anything though.I went to the dentist recently, and my teeth weren't in the best shape.. As she was testing my gums and reading the numbers back, she exclaimed to her associate that she was surprised how good of condition my gums are.That is up to you to decide if this had anything to do with it, or if I just have good genes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great all-in-one Mouthwash
reviews.reviewText: This mouthwash made my gums stop bleeding within a week. Fresh minty taste is strong enough to burn, but it foams as you swish it and you can actually feel the “clean” when you are done! My teeth are also visibly whiter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It sure is minty
reviews.reviewText: As advertised, it tastes like mint. I ran out quickly, found out my girlfriend was using it too. She won't cough up the money for half. The product is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't feel different.
reviews.reviewText: It just feels and acts like any other mouthwash. Not bad but I've almost gone through two bottles over the past 3 months and no difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Helps if you can handle the burn

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I think it works
reviews.reviewText: I mean, I am no dentist so I can’t be sure. But I’d say it works just fine. It does have an alcohol burn to it, which feels like it dries out my mouth and gums. Overall though, it probably is just as good as any mouth wash

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It really helped me a lot. Thank you!!
